parameters.name: ModelPathName
parameters.description: Array of path names of documents

parameters.name: ComponentPathName
parameters.description: Array of path names of referenced components

parameters.name: Feature
parameters.description: Array of in-context items (sketches, features, and so on)

parameters.name: DataType
parameters.description: Array of data used to create the items (converted edge or face, converted or offset sketch entity, body, and so on)

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Array of the statuses of the external references as defined in swExternalReferenceStatus_e

parameters.name: RefEntity
parameters.description: Array of actual items being used and the names of the documents that contain the items

parameters.name: FeatCom
parameters.description: Array of the names of the components in which the affected features exist; this information is only displayed when one or more RefEntity is in a different component in an assembly and does not apply to derived parts

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined by swExternalFileReferencesConfig_e

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration when configOption is swExternalFileReferencesNamedConfig

title: IComponent2.ListExternalFileReferences2
description: Gets the names and statuses of the external file references on the component.
signature:

   out System.Object
ModelPathName
,
   out System.Object
ComponentPathName
,
   out System.Object
Feature
,
   out System.Object
DataType
,
   out System.Object
Status
,
   out System.Object
RefEntity
,
   out System.Object
FeatCom
,
   out System.Int32
ConfigOption
,
   out System.String
ConfigName
)
